channel.title: RSC Unnamed [Closed Beta][Working on new MAP Look in Topic for Screenshots]
channel.description:
[b]No Name Found Yet..[/b]
[b]Updates - 24th August.[/b] - We have changed Plans about the server, we are now creating a intire new world with all Skills and Random Quests. To keep the old game play we wont add any random weapons or armors. ---------------------------------------- [b]Updates - 30th August.[/b] - The new world is making big progress as you can see in a couple of the posts below. The posts includes the Map, Dungeons, and Spots for mining fishing etc, soon showing off wilderniss remake.
[b]Closed Beta[/b] [b] Main Map preview other pictures in topic and one of our dungeons [All the blue/yellow dots are not really inside the game] [/b] [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/9572/suggestions.png[/img]
[b]Server Information[/b]
Server Base : Easy RSC. Owner : Reborn Server Coder : Reborn Zone designer : ibcrootbeer

item.title: RSC Unnamed [Closed Beta][Working on new MAP Look in Topic for Screenshots]
item.dc:creator: @hornyhamster hornyhamster
item.description:
@hornyhamster wrote:

i finished all 3 wildernesses, needs 1 more dungeon but so far there is

Main Island (with dungeons and guilds)
Wilderness (low)
Wilderness (mid, will add dungeon)
Wilderness (high, with dungeon)
DM Area (mid-lowish wildy)
-more will be added, plans on second main island in the wilderness, skill areas, monsters and safe spot in town-

i made a robot chicken… but dont think gonna add that… it hits 99 through 10000 armor

(server will reopen for beta soon, lazy owner needs to add objects :3)

Read full topic

@EndlessLife wrote:

[quote=“keesh, post:16, topic:296506”][quote author=EndlessLife link=topic=392500.msg2923833#msg2923833 date=1250897525]

lol i tested, nothing new atm, but he said wait till this week end, some new minigames hes gonna add

ill leak something… it will be a random created isle or field with buildings allowing you to be safe for a while outside the buildings there will be battles with NPC’s and other Enemy’s… more… will come later just telling this to keep you guys intrested ^^
Yes i am working on Battlefield of the Ancients.
Can’t leak alot about it yet or people will steal my idea’s but… its worth playing
[/quote]

a differnt minigame, should be fun :)[/quote]
